summary: This is a kind of joke mod.
descriptionHtml:
======================================================================
Giving The Finger
							v1.0.0
							2013-2-09
======================================================================
This is just a kind of [b][color=red]joke mod[/color][/b]. Sorry.

This mod simply replaces the hand to hand punching animations.

[i][color=#7A7A7A]How about, I give you the finger... and you give me a sweetroll.[/color][/i]

[youtube]4b0ewGhgTY4[/youtube]
[youtube]gzfJ3prztw0[/youtube]

======================================================================
Installation
======================================================================
NMM ready package.


======================================================================
Uninstallation
======================================================================
Simply uncheck my mod on NMM or

Delete the files as follows:
data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\animations\\
	h2h_attackleft.HkX
	h2h_attackright.HkX
data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\_1stperson\\animations
	h2h_attackleft.HkX
	h2h_attackright.HkX	

======================================================================
Known Issues
======================================================================
Current version doesn\'t include any esp or script.
And animation lengths are exactly same as the original animations.
So I think this mod is bug free.

======================================================================
Changelog
======================================================================
v1.0.0 2013-2-09 (Initial Release)
+Added 	h2h_attackleft.HkX
+Added 	h2h_attackright.HkX
+Added 	1stperson/h2h_attackleft.HkX
+Added 	1stperson/h2h_attackright.HkX

======================================================================
Credit
======================================================================
Yukl
	web: http://yuklryvius.tumblr.com/

======================================================================
Memo
======================================================================
I created this mod for the practice of making 1st person animation.

Actually, I intended to add a script to this mod.
It would work like: When a character does XXX, the target NPC gets angry (just same as Fury spell).
However, Perk Entry Point \"Apply Combat Hit Spell\" did not function with hand to hand attack.
I\'m not a good coder, therefore I gave up.
If there is a person knowing a lot about script, please tell me the way.
author: yukl
